attributes.action: Include in all public office elections a box noted as “none of the above”.
attributes.additional_details: If the ‘none of the above’ reaches a majority no public officer will be elected and power will reside with the public service till the next election.  The presumed vote will be with the current state
attributes.background: In many elections we are faced with no choice and person spoil there ballot paper.  This option gives a clear way of stating that no suitable candidate is present.
